questions.question: Is the system suitable for a small restaurant or food truck?
questions.answer: Yes absolutely! The system is designed to suit all restaurant sizes and applications, from small projects to large chains. You can start with the basic plan and then upgrade as your business grows.

questions.question: Can the system integrate with existing POS systems?
questions.answer: Yes, the system supports integration with most popular POS systems and banking services. It can also be linked to delivery apps like HungerStation, Talabat and Uber Eats.
